objectDesc.p: Leiden University Library CB 113: a transcript in Balinese script made on behalf of C.C. Berg in 1929 from a lontar in the collection of Jlantik. The present text is found on folios 22r through 25r of the original lontar as indicated in the transcript. Photographed by Andrea Acri in 2011

budḍa sira hana riṁ maha: pralaya, dumadi havaknira, sira ta matmahan· bhaṭara pa
ñcatathagata, śarīra nama bheda, lapva hapadudvan· rūpa:nira, bodya:gri

tvanira, siṅha:tutuṅgaṅanira, sira bharali satvabajri, sira bharali ḍarmmabajri,

śarīra, ri jroniṁ pusuḥpusuḥ, pinakasthananira. sira bhaṭa:ra:kṣobhya, mu
ṅguḥ riṁ pūrvva:, kr̥ṣṇa varṇnanira, sira bhara:li locana devīnira, hūm̐,. mantranira
, bhūḥsparśśa:na mudra: sira, Aḍarmmajña:na sira, bajra sañjatanira, riṅ abhirati
ṅaraniṁ kasvargganira, gajaḥ tutuṅganira, bhaṭa:ra bajrara:ja, bhaṭa:ra ba
jrara:ga, hyaṁ bajrasa:ḍu, bhaṭa:ra ba:jraḍara:di, saṅ amarivr̥tta ri sira, mu
ṅguḥ pva sira riṁ śarīra, ri jroniṁ paruparu pinakasthananira. sira bhaṭa:ra ratna
sambhava, muṅguḥ riṁ dakṣiṇa, pita varṇnanira, sira bharali mamaki devīnira, tram̐,
mantranira, samatajña:na sira, kaphala sañjatanira, ri jroniṁ limpa pinakastha
nanira. sira bhaṭa:ra hamittabha, muṅguḥ ri paścima, rakta varṇnanira, sira bharali pa
ṇḍaravasini devīnira, hriḥ, mantranira, pratyavekṣaṇa jña:na sira, ḍya:namudra:
sira,. na:gapa:śa sañjatanira, riṁ sukavati kasvargganira, sira bharali bajraḍarmma,
bhaṭa:ra bajratikṣṇa:, bhaṭa:ra bajrahetu, bhaṭa:ra bajrabha:ṣa, saṅ amarivr̥tta
ri sira, muṅguḥ pva sira riṁ śarīra, ri jro hati pinakasthananira. sira bhaṭa:ra ha

mantranira, Abha:mudra: sira, kr̥tanūsthanajña:nanira, riṁ kusumite ṅaraniṁ kasvargga
nira, garuḍa tutuṅgaṅanira, sira bhaṭa:ra bajraka:rmma, bhaṭa:ra bajrara:kṣa, bhaṭa:ra
